Mafia: You are part of the mafia! Each round you will choose a member to kill. Work with your fellow mafia members to kill them all!
Detective: Detective! You are the only hope of this town! Each round you will choose a suspect to investigate. Work with the citizens to remove the mafia from this town!
Citizen: You are a normal citizen in this town! Work with your fellow citizens to rid this town of evil. Every round you will vote for a player to be lynched!
Healer: You are the savior of this town! Each round you will be able to choose someone to save. Choose wisely to save as many citizens as you can!
